Vibrant green grass blades struck in sharp contrast to my mud splattered Quidditch boots as I stepped outdoors, taking a deep breath to inhale the fresh spring smell I could only identify as morning dew or the Dursley's newly cut lawn. It was a chore I had always taken on, but it accompanied a familiar pang of hunger as they wouldn't feed me until after whatever mundane task they gave was completed.

Now my footsteps were unsure, broom dragging behind as my calloused palm rubbed over slightly distended belly. 'Where did you come from?', I asked it, sucking it in as I realized that one inhale forced it our further. Walking toward the gathering students, I hoped the new flesh wasn't as obvious to others as it was to me, pants digging in and producing a soft inch of padding to hang out just below the bellybutton. 11111.content:
Rolanda Hooch blew at her whistle sharply, calling our sleep-deprived attentions to awaken or drive some of us into further irritation with the early hour.

"Gather around, come on now. No time to waste."

"Too bloody cheery for this early in the morning." Rubbing the sleep out of his eyes while muttering, Ron had joined in last minute looking as if he'd rolled out of bed with morning breath to match ginger spikes sticking out as if lovebirds endured a spat over the nest.

My chuckle caught Madam Hooch's attention, cat-like optics whipping around to center in on us. Damn. That was never a good sign.

"Mr. Weasely, if you'd be so kind as to pair up with Mr.Longbottom. Harry, scoot. Practice is with Mr.Malfoy today."

From the corner of my eye, platinum hair caught my attention as if it were the snitch, Malfoy leaving the castle to leisurely grace the class with his presence. A scowl formed over my face as I mirrored his own once he discovered his fate and stood beside me, hand on the latest aviary model of expensive mahogany. Cheeky bastard looked prim and proper, hair so perfectly in place that I had to wonder if he'd used charms.

We managed to stay civil under the professor's constant inspection, silently mounting our brooms once everyone was partnered up.

"Today, we will practice how to safely rescue another wizzard mid air. Up you go. First, a lap around the pitch." The witch now turned her attention to the class and it was then that Malfoy's voice rang out.

"Don't you look well fed this morning, Potter?"

Cold-hearted, gray eyes accusingly darted to my middle, a smirk claiming triumph as he tugged his own shirt up to reveal a slender abdomen. "I suppose not all of us can be this good looking."

My reply was cut off, fury gripping me in the shame of it all as I glanced down to realize the forward crouch had made the curve of my newly acquired belly pronounce along a uniform which suddenly felt all too small.

"Fuck off, Malfoy." I lamely replied though from the scare in his eyes I'd managed enough venom with my tone to compensate. No, wait. That wasn't a frightened look. It was the same one I'd used on breakfast. It was hunger.

Sharp, silvery orbs set on my belly bulge again, as if they were mapping out every extra calorie I'd so greedily indulged in. I tried to hold in my breath, earning myself some dignity by not letting it *all* hang out there. Coercing barely half an inch inside as I both suctioned and clenched whatever abs I still had left, it was no use.The stubborn new girth showed through as the material clung onto its rounded form. Hell, this was so embarrassing. I simply had eaten too much and I could feel the solid mass pushing out for anyone to see. The situation was only worsened by the insufferable git staring on.

I fully expected one of his snarky remarks any second, but none came. What was going on? Now stuck taking in stormy grays as he practically devoured me on site, my own mind faltered as I struggled for a proper taunt to end the eerie battle.

Madam Hooch blew the whistle, my feet kicking off the ground with all my strength. It had been the most awkward, drawn out moment of my life and oddly enough, I noted my own arousal adding to the strain my pants were already putting up with.

1112.content:
Trying not to think too much how his clothes felt a little tight that morning, Harry hurried along to his Charms class, meeting up with Ron and Hermione along the way. He felt a little self conscious, as if they would be able to tell that he had gained a few pounds lately, but neither of them seemed to notice. They made their way into Professor Flitwick's classroom, and took their usual seat in the second row; Hermione insisted that the closer they got, the easier it was for them to pick up on the wand work. Ron insisted that only geeks sat in the front row, and had received a dark look from Hermione for it. So the ultimatum was for the three of them to share a desk in the second row.

"Right now, class," Flitwick announced once he had clambered up onto his podium so that his tiny figure could actually be seen, "I've got a new charm to teach you today, so wands out," Harry pulled his out from his pocket, with a tingle of excitement; new charms were always something to look forward to, "This is a charm originally used to hold back enemies without physically hurting them. It's called Fattica Apuda, and will make your enemies fat." There was an excited murmuring about the class, though Lavender Brown had paled several shades from the mere thought of ever being overweight. "This in turn will slow them down to give you enough time to escape."

"I wonder if the Fat Lady had one of those charms put on her?" Ron muttered, Harry had to stifle a sudden laugh, and Hermione elbowed the lanky red head hard in the ribs.

"The counter charm to reverse the effect is 'Fattica Reverso'," Flitwick continued, there was a scratching of quills as students hurried to write down both charms, "This is very important to remember, otherwise the weight can only be removed by good diet and exercise," there was a sprinkling of laughter amongst the students, "Any questions?" predictably, Hermione's hand shot straight into the air, "Yes, Miss Granger?"

"What counts as 'fat'?" Hermione questioned, "Is there a set amount of weight someone will gain, or does it depend on their original size?" Flitwick beamed at the question.

"Good question, Miss Granger. Generally a target will gain weight depending on the strength of the user," Flitwick explained, "For example a powerful wizard or witch will be able to double someone's weight with just one incantation. But I imagine this class would only be able to add one or two pounds at the moment," he nodded, "I will be handing out hamsters for you to practise on," he added, before gesturing for Seamus to give him a hand with the box, "Having the fattest hamster at the end of the class will earn you a prize."

"A prize, huh?" Ron looked bemused as a hamster was placed on his desk by Seamus, "I wonder what it is. Flitwick is usually pretty generous with prizes." Already Harry knew that Ron's mind would be on money, and he turned to Hermione instead, who was already starting to cast the charm on her hamster.

"Fattica Apuda," Hermione muttered as she swooped her wand down towards the tiny creature, who gave a squeak as it bloated out a little, much to Hermione's delight. She gave Harry a toothy smile, before setting about casting the charm on the creature over and over. Harry looked down to his own hamster, a lazy little creature that was led on his desk and gazing up at him with beady black eyes. About to try the charm for himself, Harry jumped on hearing a crackle next to him.

"You still haven't gotten your wand fixed, Ron?" Harry exclaimed wearily as he looked over to his best friend, "That's not going to work."

"Just you wait and see," Ron's face went the colour of his hair as he tried again, swinging the broken wand down towards his desk, "Fattica Apuda!" There was a bright light as the spell shot out, missing the hamster completely. It instead shot off to the side, striking Harry firmly in the stomach.

11123.content:
Harry felt a rush inside of him as the spell hit him, too stunned to even chastise Ron for not being more careful. A warm, rising sensation flooded his entire body. It was surprisingly pleasant, Harry would have enjoyed it had it not been for the rest of the class staring at him. Slowly but surely, Harry was starting to billow out with rolls of fat. His already tight shirt tightened even further, the buttons straining against the flab. Soon they gave up, and pinged off, leaving the stretched material to rip apart and show Harry's rapidly growing gut to the world. His behind filled out against the seat of his pants until the seams were almost bursting, his waistband dug in tightly to his thicker waist. Soon the button for that broke, and his zipper rolled down with the sheer amount of pressure from his stomach.

Harry rounded out even further, his arms being pushed out from his sides a little as they grew softer, Ron and Hermione had to push their chairs back a little. He was simply enormous by the time the growth finally stopped, a round butterball that had to weigh around 380lbs. There was a creak before his chair broke from underneath his weight, a couple of cruel laughs starting up through the class. Harry sat there, stunned, his shirt left in two tatters across his far softer body. His pants were only just holding on, one sudden movement, and they would rip completely.

"Class," Flitwick clapped his hands sharply, "Please get back to work." He hopped down to make his way over to the obese Harry, who realised with some shame that his stomach was over twice the size of his professor, "You need to get to the Hospital Wing," Flitwick offered gravely, "Dear me.. can you stand?"

"Can't we just use the counter charm?" Ron questioned guiltily, reaching an arm down to help his best friend up, "I mean, you could do that, right?" He grasped one of Harry's chubby hands, struggling to lift the obese teenager to his feet.

"Even if you wand was working, Mr Weasley," Flitwick began as he watched Harry struggle to his feet, "This is no normal spell. It's tripled the effect. A simple counter charm isn't going to work. This needs Madam Pomfrey's touch." Harry felt his face flush as he turned to awkwardly walk towards the door, realising he was now waddling. He could hear Ron behind him, and did his best to keep his temper in check. It wasn't Ron's fault his wand had broken.

"I'm sorry, mate," Ron spoke once they were walking side by side in the hallway, "I really am."

"Don't be," Harry sighed, "I guess things like this just happen to me, right?" he threw Roy a look, before offering a good natured smile, "Besides, could be worse. If you hit Hermione you'd be turned into a rat by now." Ron burst into relieved laughter at that, and the atmosphere relaxed between them.

The walk to the Hospital Wing took longer than usual, Harry's excess weight meant that he had to stop and catch his breath every now and again. Ron pushed open the door first, and Harry waddled in after him.

You decide that you would call for the only one that

A:) Could possibly hear you, and

Before you can continue, though, Dobby nods with an understanding look on his face.

Your mind flashes back to other times Dobby tried to 'help' you, and begin to regret asking him for help.

"Dobby will help" He snaps his fingers once, and your clothing, which unfortunately included your wand, disappears. Hopefully, he moved it to your trunk.

I can tell I'm getting fatter," she said, gesturing down to her deep cleavage, jiggly belly, wide hips and meaty thighs. "And the others are too."

"Well... it's natural for people your age to put on a little weight," said Mrs Weasley weakly, but Ginny interrupted her.

"Mum, I don't mind! I love getting to enjoy these big meals, and I like Harry's belly too," she said, and it was her turn to blush. "I think I can help you if you explain it to me. Take the spell off me, then I won't have to resist it and we can talk."

Molly hesitated. "All right," she said, waving her wand and muttering a counter-charm. Ginny shook her head, like a swimmer dislodging water from her ears, which made her double chin wobble. Then she looked down at herself again.

"Wow!" she exclaimed, sinking her fingers into her belly. "I knew something was up, but... I'm huge! I must be over 20 stone!"

"Don't be upset, dear," said Mrs Weasley anxiously.

"There's one to make the food taste better, and one to make your stomachs get bigger," Mrs Weasley said, relieved Ginny wasn't angry and opening the book again to show her. "I haven't taken those off you... unless you want me to?"

"No, leave them!" said Ginny, her eyes skimming over the spells. "I LOVE being able to eat so much... But we're going back to Hogwarts tomorrow... we'll be back to eating ordinary food."

"Well," said Mrs Weasley, casually, "you don't HAVE to go back..."

Ginny raised her eyebrows. "Mum, you know I love your cooking, but... you can't keep us here forever. Besides, at the rate we're going, we're going to be too big for this house soon!" Ginny shut the book and clutched it to her ample bosom. "I've got an idea."

* * *

So, Ginny and her mother had made an agreement. Mrs Weasley would let the four of them go back to Hogwarts at last, and let Ginny take the spellbook with her and keep the fattening spells working, and in return Ginny would report back to her mother on the progress of the four rapidly gaining Gryffindors.

Ginny grinned to herself as she pondered the future effects of her and her mother's plan. As Harry finally reached the top of the stairs, out of breath, he wheezed, "What are you... smiling at?"

12111211111111112.content:
Hermione had her evaluation just after Harry, with Professor McGonagall replacing Professor Snape. She wasn't too worried about it, and was in fact more concerned with the fact that she'd only gotten an 'Exceeds Expectations' in her last Ancient Runes test, rather than her usual 'Outstanding'.She guessed she had been spending a lot of time with Ron, rather than in the library, but she hadn't realized it would affect her grades.

She entered the examination room and was ushered behind a small screen by Madam Pomfrey. She removed her robes and her uniform, stripping down to her underwear. She was still going over her result as she stepped on the scale, which, being a magical scale, spoke her weight aloud in a rather nasally voice.

"11 stone, 12 pounds!"

Madam Pomfrey grunted and wrote it down on a piece of parchment, moving over to the measuring chart, but Hermione was shocked. When she had last weighed herself, just before school started, she had weighed just under 11 stone! Could she really have put on almost a stone without noticing?

As she got changed into her swimming costume, she looked at herself in the mirror. Her belly was bigger than she remembered, bulging out over her panties, and as she turned around, she was horrified to see that they were riding up, revealing a lot of her much rounder bum.

"Pants a little snug?" The mirror asked snidely.

Hermione blushed and hurried out to the pool.

She swam the lengths with relative ease, slowly but steadily. As she moved on to the running track she could feel the too tight shorts constricting her thighs, and her lunch, a large helping of stew with bread and butter, felt heavy in her stomach. She had never been the most athletic girl, and she really felt it now, and was out of breath by the hallway point of the first lap. She finished eventually and, panting and puffing, made her way to the office for her evaluation.

"Really Miss Granger," chided Professor McGonagall, "These results just aren't good enough!"

She entered the results into the register and shook her head. "A smart girl like you should know the dangers of being overweight. I expect a big improvement at your next evaluation, starting with a loss of at least five pounds!"
Hermione looked down at her feet, embarrassed. She felt like she had failed a test, and in a way she had. She should have felt awful, but she didn’t. It was bizarre, but hearing McGonagall calling her over weight had kind of… turned her on. As she went to get changed back into her uniform, she took a minute to examine herself. Her butt was bigger, and her belly was sticking out. Her boobs had grown a little too, and her thighs felt thicker. As she fastened her skirt, she realized she had to suck in her gut to do so, and once again she got a slight tinge of, excitement.
“You’re getting a little chubby dearie.” The mirror announced, unpleasantly.
Hermione smiled. “I am, aren’t I?”
The mirror remained silent, probably confused by her confidence.

At the Welcome Feast, Harry and Ron watched the usual Sorting and speech from Dumbledore. Ron was trying to be patient, but he just wanted the food to arrive as soon as possible, so he could start working on gaining the weight he desired. Harry, on the other hand, told himself that he would have to be careful what he ate this year, as he didn't want to balloon in size. The House Elves had really outdone themselves this year. The Gryffindor table was loaded with various roast meats, jugs of gravy, creamy mashed potatoes, Yorkshire puddings, piles of vegetables of all kinds, and baskets of bread with butter and cheese. The students were all happily eating, comparing summer stories between bites. Ron, after having had one of everything, filled his plate a second time. Harry was trying his best to pace himself, but everything just looked so good that it was hard to resist taking seconds. It became even more difficult when the desserts arrived.

"Oh, my favourite!" Ron exclaimed as the new food appeared.

"Which one?" Hermione asked, as there were several types of cakes, puddings, and ice cream in front of them.

Ron paused for a moment as he looked at the vast selection. "Erm, all of them?" Hermione just rolled her eyes and took a piece of white chocolate cheesecake for herself. Harry had helped himself to a large slice of treacle tart and a scoop of ice cream, while Ron was busy putting one of everything on his over-loaded plate. He was feeling rather full, but was determined to eat as much dessert as possible. It was a good thing that the school robes were loose and covering, because after having eaten huge amounts at breakfast, on the train, and now at the feast, he thought he might have to undo the button on his trousers. He shoved one more brownie into his mouth and sat back, absolutely stuffed. Harry, although he hadn't eaten as much as his friend, was pretty full too, and could feel his belly pushing against the buttons of his already-tight school shirt.

"Are you two finished pigging out?" Hermione asked, "Harry, I thought we said on the train you were going to try and lose some weight?"

"I will, Hermione, but this was the Welcoming Feast! It only happens once a year, so it would be a shame to not enjoy it. I'll start worrying about what I eat tomorrow. Besides, it won't be long until Quidditch starts, and I'll have no problem losing weight then." Harry heaved his full body up from the table, trying not to think about whether he would actually fit into his Quidditch uniform. "C'mon, lets get the password and go up to the Common Room."

121112111122.content:
As soon as they made it back to the common room, Hermione looked up and took off the metabolism curse on Harry reverting his metabolism back to it's pre-summer state. She also took his measurements - for research's sake, at 5'4 and 145lbs Harry had made his way to the chubby side of the spectrum.

As usual Hogwarts food was delicious, all one could ask for. Ron's newfound interest in eating and stuffing himself led Harry astray and gone were any thoughts he once had of losing weight. Every morning Ron and Harry would wake up ravenous and head down to breakfast to gorge themselves on pancakes with thick syrup and cream, waffles, bacon, sausage, eggs, pastrys - anything they desired as Hogwarts did not restrict the diets of the students.

After breakfast came the morning classes, Harry, sitting in class with a very full stomach found he was actually able to concentrate harder - much to Ron's dismay and Hermione's pleasure. By lunchtime he was once again starving and stuffed himself once again right alongside Ron.

Dinner of course was where Ron and Harry outdid themselves, plates of the main course along with big glasses of milk and pumpkin juice was followed by all sorts of desserts - cakes, cookies, chocolates. The boys would stagger back upstairs and while Ron lazed around Harry found himself more often then not with a brain rush and would spend his time reading and studying.

This trend continued for the next few weeks and by the end of September Quidditch season was to begin. All this eating had an effect on both boys physiques. Ron's stomach was covered in a good inch of fat and had started to droop over his tightening pants, his arms and face had also softened.

For Harry, his already chubby body was now seemingly closer to 'overweight'. His face had softened to the point where there was a hint underneath his chin, his arms had pudged out loosing most of their definition. It was his stomach that had the most drastic change. It was now quite a pile of soft squishy fat. Harry's pants had gotten too tight to the point where he had to do them up underneath his belly, letting his belly hang over by a good two inches. His pecs also softened and began to slightly droop.

After his last class on Friday, Harry found himself heading up to put on his Quidditch uniform, panting by the time he reached the dorm he dug through his trunk for his uniform. Fastening the pants below his belly he struggled with the tight tshirt. Pulling it down Harry found it did not entirely cover his belly leaving his overhang to hang out. Hoping the cloak would cover him he headed out to the pitch.

The practice was a struggle for Harry as he found his movements on the broom slower as his form was not as lithe as it once was. By the end of practice Katie - the new captain, pulled him aside.

"Harry - wow, you've really put on a few huh?" she said.
"I suppose so....." Harry replied.
"Look, not that your not adorable but really Harry - a seeker needs to be fast and light, so as much as I hate to say it we should probably try out other seekers until your back in form".
Harry, really worn out from the practice only wondered to himself "I love to fly - but I don't need Quidditch to do that, Katie I think it's for the best if you find someone else full time",
"ok Harry - but you know if you lose the weight you've got a spot ya?"
"thanks Katie". Harry was a bit depressed now, coming to school with the intent of losing weight he'd only managed to put on more. Reaching the front doors of the castle Harry met with Ron who was heading to the Kitchens.

"Hey mate...you ok?" Ron asked.
"Ya, not going to play Quidditch this year" , Harry responded
"Well at least you'll have more time to hang out right?" was Ron's response, "c'mon let's get some cake."

The next two months of term passed quickly for Harry, both boys continued to put away mass amounts of food and with a renewed focus on his studies Harry found his grades had picked up - to the point where he was competitive with Hermione! In fact Potions - once his worst subject was now one of his best, though this could be put down to Snape being discovered as a spy and beginning to treat Harry like all the other students.

The teacher's however had noticed Harry (and Ron's) drastic weight gain and where concerned. As Snape said in the staff lounge one day to McGonagall - "I could have foreseen Weasleys weight gain as the boy has always proved lazy - Potter on the other hand, his marks have gone up, and he's quieter - much to quiet, are you quite sure nothing is wrong?"
"Why Severus, I didn't know you cared"
"I don't, well someone has to! There is something wrong...."
"What do you suppose we do about it?"

Dumbledore walks in - "Why Severus I'm glad you're so concerned with our students health, I've been thinking why not introduce Physical Evaluations and Physical Education for all the upper year students, they must learn to take care of themselves."

Severus just looked at him, thinking to himself 'uh oh' what did I start?

"Yes Yes , Severus you can teach the 6 and 7th year boys, Minerva shall teach the girls. Why we can even set up a gymnasium, oh and let's not forget a swimming pool and track as well!" And with that Dumbledore clapped his hands and walked right out.

As Ginny prepared her next weapon of attack against Lavender's waistline, she watched in wonder as Lavender's breakfasts became less like diet meals and more like surreptitious binge sessions.

Things for Lav started well enough. For the first three days her breakfast, lunch, and dinner, were all small portions. But her belly was used to being stuffed and stretched throughout the day now, not just during Ginny's nighttime raids, and each day without a stuffing made it protest more. On the fourth day, Lavender was determined to avoid embarrassment, so she gave her stomach just a little more at each meal in order to prevent it from growling so loudly. The following day, Ginny watched as Lavender once again ate herself into a stupor. Somewhat prepared for this, Ginny intervened as soon as Lavender's two giant bowls of Goblin Gruel were empty. Draping one of Lavender's arms around her shoulders, Ginny said "C'mon Lavender, it's time for you to help me with my potions practice like you promised you would!" Lavender nodded dumbly and the two of them slowly walked back to the Gryffindor common room.

This time around, there had been enough people attending breakfast to notice the weird behaviour of the two girls; however, as soon as they were out of sight everyone quickly moved on to other thoughts. Only Hermione seemed vexed. "Why didn't Ginny ask me for help?" she huffed. "I'm top of class, not Lavender."
"Maybe it's because you're so fond of telling everyone how top of class you are?" Ron suggested from beside her.
Hermione elbowed him in the ribs.

Upstairs, Ginny had decided that they would bypass the common room, and they went straight to the girl's dormitory instead. Lavender was on her bed, reclining against her headboard, while Ginny sat beside her at the edge of her bed. "Gin..." Lavender looked up at Ginny with plaintive eyes that were half-lidded from drowsiness, and her face looked slightly confused by the gentle discomfort caused by all the food she had ingested. Ginny felt like she was about to melt from the adorable scene. A small *burp* ejected from the older girl, followed by a giggle, but then her face turned to one of concern. "I think I ate too much."
"Nonesense," Ginny cooed soothingly. "I had some Ore-Oats today too, and my stomach feels really heavy as well. It must have been a bad batch."
Lavender's sleepy face brightened into a smile. "Oh good, I thought I had eaten too much."
"Not at all, everyone has noticed how nutritious and balanced your meals have been lately."
"Really?" Lavender blushed happily. "I'm glad, I've been working really hard to watch my portions lately."
"Of course you've been Lav," Ginny's voice was lower and huskier than before. "I know I told you a few weeks back that I thought you looked great, but since you've started dieting, I think that your figure looks even better" she purred. Her face and body were now very close to Lavender's; the older girl would have felt uncomfortable at how little personal space she had left if not for the combined effect of her drowsiness and Ginny's flattery.
Lavender felt overjoyed by her compliments. "You're a great friend Ginny."
"The feeling is mutual." The redhead moved her hand to Lavender's belly, and felt a little shocked at how quickly it arrived there. The older girl had stuffed herself to a level beyond what Ginny had ever achieved during their nighttime sessions; combined with the extra pounds recently added to it, Lavender's belly had reached a size that could only be called... exciting.

Lavender looked at Ginny's hand on her stomach, and then looked up at Ginny questioningly.
For a second Ginny froze, but she recovered quickly, and removed her hand. "Why don't I go get you something for that aching belly?"
"Thanks Gin," Lavender said quietly. Her eyelids closed a little more so that they were just barely open.

Ginny got up and moved to leave the dormitory. As she exited, she turned around and said casually, "while I'm gone, you should change out of your robes, you must be boiling in those things." Lavender shook her head. "I feel fine."
Once in the common room, Ginny flicked her wand at the fireplace to make it as hot as possible. Some first years who were in there looked at her questioningly.
"My friend has a cold." Ginny said archly. She would brook no opposition to her plans.
The first years nodded meekly. Between her bright red hair, her flushed-red face, and her seeming affinity for fire, Ginny projected a fiery disposition that made the young students wonder if she wasn't part dragon.
Ginny headed to where the potions were, so that she could mix something up to "take care" of poor Lavender.
